Title: Fool Me Once
Plot: Painful truths reorient several relationships and careers; Pennsatucky feels disrespected by Piper, which is not good; Larry delivers an ultimatum.
GuestStars: Chris Beetem, Danielle Brooks, Michael Chernus, Tracee Chimo, Joel Marsh Garland, Annie Golden, Lauren Lapkus, Taryn Manning, Matt McGorry, Dascha Polanco, Nick Sandow, Samira Wiley
